about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Earth Day 2022 Shop] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Fishy Coral Planter
  • Baby Blue Counter
  • Sea Blue Carpet
  • Under The Sea Sticker
  • Octopus Open
  • Love Earth Box
  • Starfish Clock
  • Blue Algae Wall


**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
